word: G5492 - χειμάζω - cheimázō - khi-mad'-zo - Be tossed with tempest

sections.paragraph: சுருக்க விளக்கம் / Short Definition: Be tossed with tempest
to afflict with a tempest, to toss about upon the waves
ஆங்கில மூலம் / Original in English: From the same as G5494; to storm, that is, (passively) to labor under a gale: - to tossed with tempest.
